data.title: Kamal Hassan
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Kamal Hassan on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text: Kamal Hassan began his acting career with roles in such films as "Poikkal Kudhirai" (1983), the Radhika Sarathkumar drama "Swati Mutyam" (1985) and the comedy "Pushpack Vamin" (1987) with Amala. He also appeared in "Thevar Magan" (1992) and the drama "Magalir Mattum" (1994) with Revathy. His passion for acting continued to his roles in projects like "Mumbai express" (2005), "Vettaiyadu Villaiyadu" (2006) and "Dasavatharam" (2008). Recently, he tackled roles in "Dashavtar" (2009), "Vishwaroop" (2013) and "Cheekati Raajyam" (2015). He also appeared in "Papanasam" (2015). Hassan most recently acted in "Uttama Villain" (2015) with Jayaram.
